name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Print email without logo for Gmail™

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Print email content without email service provider logo for Gmail™.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily clean up your email prints with our simple and effective extension. Once installed and activated, this extension automatically hides the Gmail™ logo when you print your emails, giving you a clean, professional-looking output. No complicated settings, just straightforward functionality. Perfect for anyone who needs to print email content without the clutter of branding. Enjoy a seamless, no-hassle experience!
